Merry Christmas to all from Prodrafts! This time we bring you the following update 1. Notes supports horizontal scrolling 2. Notes pages can be added by dragging and dropping 3. Vertical unlimited text export will now automatically export after clipping in A4 4. Optimized PDF export efficiency 5. Fix some other nasty issues
Fix known issues to improve fluency
1. Fixed the issue that note mode could not be saved occasionally 2. Optimize English translation 3. Polish the details
1. Improve data storage security 2. Fix the problem that the image template cannot be used

New feature! Pin icon to differentiate your focus! 1. Redo the pin vision and optimize the operation details. 2. Add status bar switch disable click status bar jump 3. Fixed the issue that the Note deleted page does not refresh 4. Fix the problem that the position of the tape noose cannot be withdrawn 5. Optimize the conflict between system gesture and left sideslip gesture in front of the desk scheduling mode 6. Optimize for hidden performance issues

1. New function slide out recently used files from the left side of notes quickly switch or split screen 2. Note export supports selecting whether to include attachments and strokes 3. Pin list headings support multiple lines 4. Fix some other issues and performance optimizations

1. Optimize iCloud storage and improve data security 2. After iCloud exits the account or switches accounts data will be removed from the local area. 3. Fix the problem that the data out of the trash is not synchronized. 4. Fix some flash back issues
Fix known problems and adapt to new system versions
New feature highlighter smart marker 1. Now in Notes you can easily highlight delete and underline using highlighters. 2. Fix inaccurate Notes screenshots. 3. Fix some other issues.
Fixed the issue that the cover image was not displayed when it was created Optimize iCloud saving logic

1. Text can be zoomed in and changed with a lasso 2. Note support copy and paste pages support multi select export delete copy pages 3. Greatly optimize the smoothness of the canvas and reduce lag 4. Optimize iCloud speed 5. Fixed the issue that the Note reduction graph crashed when opened in low versions 6. Fix the problem that text is not displayed on multiple devices 7. Fix a lot of details

1. Important updates! Prodrafts Notes allows you to create paginated notes just like traditional note taking software import notes directly into PDFS and all the features of infinite canvas are well preserved in Notes. At the same time we designed outline for note custom outline bookmark good looking pages thumbnails add pages double page reading and other functions. You can also use the routing feature in Prodrafts for quick links to Prodrafts notes. 2. Smudge to erase smudge notes erase quickly saving the trouble of switching eraser you can turn on this function in eraser 3. Lasso optimization: We re optimized the lasso and all attachments support operations such as copy cut and copy. At the same time we also designed a new rectangular lasso which can be more convenient to select boxes and extract screenshots. 4. Lasso supports the selection of artboards which are not included by default 5. Folders support color and icon classification 6. Support split screen collaboration. Now you can split screen the same infinite canvas and draw at the same time without conflict 7. The pen case has been optimized to support the optimization of hiding and position adjustment 8. The home page supports direct scanning of documents to convert them into Prodrafts Notes 9. Artboard Copy now copies the contents of the artboard at the same time 10. The eraser supports resizing 11. The adhesive tape can also be operated when the attachment is locked 12. Pen case allows adding ruler 13. Fixed an issue where the home page suddenly disappeared 14. Other visual and experience optimizations For better compatibility we no longer support devices below iOS14 Thank you for your support and welcome to the new Prodrafts3.0

Some very important updates 1. The backup function is added in the Settings. You can export all your files at once and restore them when you need them. 2. Scientific calculator added historical record and collection function. 3. We have added a NEW A4 dividing line so you can use endless A4 dividing paper on a large canvas. 4. We have unified the direction of pictures of different formats and solved the previous problem of inaccurate direction. 5. Optimized save logic. As for missing data we are still working on optimizations and this update has made corresponding adjustments so that you can use the backup function to save important files when appropriate.

Prodrafts have a major update with new releases. Including but not limited to: 1 Paper texture background more comfortable eye protection. The thickness and color of the brush can be fixed like a tender dried carrot planted on the page . 3 Text Artboard big improvement! Into a transparent text box can freely insert different colors different font text text box itself background color can also be modified! 4 new timer function! Forward and reverse timing can be! 5. Removed interactive improvements! You can long press to delete! Ontology in the draft can also be deleted. 6 folder has also been improved! Existing drafts can be dragged into new files for sorting. 7 The one click empty button is in the eraser. To prevent users from accidentally touching. Fitting function can be free to choose whether to open draw triangle identification more accurate! The line thickness and retraction of the fitting handwriting are optimized. 9 PDF small window view can also be freely dragged to meet the cover obsessive compulsive disorder 10 Insert the drawing board can modify the transparency the size of the visualization convenient rubbing friends copy drawing There are many more new changes waiting for you to discover
